results.title: Crosses
results.brief_description: A documentary that examines the experiences of Australian soldiers fighting in the Middle East and at Gallipoli during World War 1, between 1914-1918. Archival film footage shows the conditions on the battlefields, and ex-soldiers recount their experiences.
results.description: A documentary that examines the experiences of Australian soldiers fighting in the Middle East and at Gallipoli during World War 1, between 1914-1918. Archival film footage shows the conditions on the battlefields, and ex-soldiers recount their experiences.

results.title: Creating a homely atmosphere
results.creator_credit: Tim Abbott, Helen Edwards, Tony Shaddock and Dept of Health, Richmond Implementation Unit
results.brief_description: Designed to introduce the intellectual disability residential care worker to some simple ways of creating a homelike environment in the physical sense with furnishing and decor, how to create a desirable psychological atmosphere through community involvement and high quality staff-resident, staff-staff and resident-resident interactions, an interpretation of the term “normalisation” and how this principle might be applied in a residential setting and the recognition of the individual resident’s rights in what is their home. Accompanied by 32p. in-service training manual.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tim Abbott, Helen Edwards, Tony Shaddock and Dept of Health, Richmond Implementation Unit

results.title: Cross and passion
results.creator_credit: Claire Pollak, Kim Longinotto and British Film Institute
results.brief_description: The women of Northern Ireland tell their stories in this film shot in the troubled Catholic ghetto area of West Belfast. Shows how life for Women in Belfast’s ghettos is dominated by the contrasting power of the church and army.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Claire Pollak, Kim Longinotto and British Film Institute

results.title: Crocodile Dundee II. (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: John Cornell, Jane Scott and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Begins in New York where Dundee now lives with his journalist girlfriend. In order to escape the pursuit of an international drug ring who have murdered her former husband, Dundee and his girlfriend return to the Australian outback where Dundee is well prepared to confront them.

results.title: Crocodile Dundee (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Peter Fairman, John Cornell, Hoyts, Paramount Pictures and Rimfire Films
results.brief_description: A New York reporter is intrigued by stories of an Australian crocodile hunter (Paul Hogan) and accompanies him on a journey through the bush. She entices him back to Manhattan, where his very outback Australian approach to the dangers of a big city, make him a success in New York society.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter Fairman, John Cornell, Hoyts, Paramount Pictures and Rimfire Films

results.title: Crocodile Dundee
results.creator_credit: Peter Faiman, John Cornell, Hoyts, Paramount Pictures and Rimfire Films
results.brief_description: A New York reporter is intrigued by stories of an Australian crocodile hunter, Mick ‘Crocodile’ Dundee, and accompanies him on a journey through the bush. She entices him back to Manhattan where his easy-going approach to the dangers of life in a big city make him a success in New York society. Stars Paul Hogan and Linda Kozlowski.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter Faiman, John Cornell, Hoyts, Paramount Pictures and Rimfire Films

results.title: Crane
results.creator_credit: Margaret Anne Smith, Australian Film Commission and Smith Street Films
results.brief_description: Set in the shipping terminal at Glebe Island, Sydney this short film explores the life and emotions of crane-operator Ron Watson (Robert Noble) who is facing a crisis situation both at home and at work. His job is demanding, often requiring shift-work and long hours. His marriage is falling apart because of his obsession with work and yet Ron seems unable to prevent the inevitable. And the job itself is a dangerous one requiring total focus and agility. Ron, like many of his co-workers on the water front, finally is confronted with the stresses around him and is forced to face the grim reality of his situation. Cast also includes Maya Potter, Joseph Petruzzi, Bob Hornery, Nicholas Flanagan. Original music by Colin Watson, Jim Conway with drums by Hanumandas and cinematography by Brendon Young.

results.title: Cowboy Bebop. Vol. 4
results.creator_credit: Kazuhiko Ikeguchi, Masahiko Minami, Shinichiro Watanabe, Bandai Visual Company, Sunrise Inc and Victor Entertainment
results.brief_description: This stylish and action packed Japanese anime television series is set in a 21st century dystopia where the earth is a wasteland and the solar system is besieged by a proliferation of gangsters. A motley group of bounty hunters who occupy a rickety ship, the ‘Bebop’, reluctantly band together. The group consists of Spike Siegel, a vicious fighter whose cynicism covers painful memories; Jet Black, a former policeman; Faye Valentine, a femme fatale and compulsive gambler; and Ed, a computer hacker girl. Session 15 “My funny Valentine” Faye tries to come to terms with the fact that she knows little about her past, prior to being cryogenically frozen. Session 16 “Black dog serenade” A riot on a prison ship unites Jet with an old cohort from his police days. When the criminal is the same one responsible for the loss of his arm, Jet seeks retribution. Session 17 “Mushroom samba” The Bebop is out of fuel, cash and food - consequently Ed takes on a bounty hunter mission, looking for a crooked magic mushroom dealer. Session 18 “Speak like a child” An anonymous package arrives for Faye, which leads to some clues about her mystifying past. “Cowboy Bebop” is an amusing cross-pollination between anime, the Western genre, classic Sci-fi flicks, and neo-noir with an anti-hero narrative overlayed with ultra cool aesthetics.

results.title: Cowboy and Maria in town
results.creator_credit: Annie Stiven, Les McLaren, Australian Film Commission and Vingan
results.brief_description: Attracted by the myths of town life, and the chance of work, people from villages all over Papua New Guinea have come to the towns. This documentary tells the story of two such migrants living in the settlements that surround the Capital Port Moresby. Cowboy is a reformed ‘rascal’ who plays rock and roll on a homemade guitar in the street earning just enough for his family to get by. Maria lives an equally precarious existence. Seasonal gardening, and her husband’s small income as a night security guard are their means of survival. Cowboy and Maria are vital players in the new urban Papua New Guinea. Their interwoven stories highlight the consequences of urban drift, where traditional and Western values meet.

results.title: Craftsmart: christmas special
results.creator_credit: Phillip Harris, Kingwest Productions and Lennox Television Productions
results.brief_description: Great Australian Christmas decoration ideas, with Lena Williams who gives step by step instructions to make low cost, easy and highly decorative handicrafts including a traditional Christmas wreath and an Australian Christmas table setting complete with bread basket, napkins, salt and pepper shakers and an Australian centrepiece and bon bons.
